name: Inheritance (Games By Alex)
description:
Mysteries, bewilderment, and shocks are  a-plenty in Inheritance- a thrilling episodic gaming experience!

  Upon the untimely death of your parents, you and your sister find yourselves under the care of your loving grandmother. Given the circumstances, all seem fine enough until you start having the most horrible of dreams- dreams of zombies, monsters, torment, and woe! You don't think much of it until the waking world and your dream world slowly start to become one! Danger and dread become apparent as you race against the clock to save those that mean the most to you while overcoming your own demons.

Solve mysteries as you progress through this exciting episodic mini series. Each episode takes between ten to fifteen minutes to complete, and new episodes will (hopefully) be released in a timely manner! 

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move around and the A button to interact with your surroundings!
